attributes.review: This app was supposed to be useful with keeping me up to date on election and campaign news. But it’s useless, if anything it’s causing my phone to crash whenever I click new things. Super upset that I can’t use this app, but it’s just not functional. It’s okay though, I’ll just get my news regarding president cheeto from another app instead. Yeah❤️
attributes.title: Would not recommend

attributes.review: So I wanted to see this ✨orange✨ attempt to try to be re-elected again and it asked me to put in my phone number or whatever. And I am sad to say that the instructions were unclear and now my grandmother is in a ✨Walgreens✨ with no underwear nor shoes in New York. So that is very ✨unfortunate and unprofessional✨ I am terrified that they want to keep T H I S app open but not tiktok. Very sad to see this is what America has came to.😔
attributes.title: Very sad

attributes.review: Just rating it 5 stars because people are trying to take it down since they can’t respect other people’s political views.
attributes.title: 5 Stars

attributes.review: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE. I got this app TODAY. but as soon as i did my fingers turned orange! i panicked and tried licking the color off and it tasted like cheetos!!!! After an hour all of me was orange! i bit myself and I WAS A CHEETO! i tasted pretty good, but that’s not the point. As soon as i deleted it i turned back to normal, but then i noticed my cheetos were gone from my pantry! this app steals your cheetos.. it’s a big cheeto stealing meany like the president.
attributes.title: cheeto ball

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my beautiful and wonderful sexist, racist, orange   commander in chief, Ronald Rump, but I was very disappointed with the quality!! Once I downloaded the app, I started seeing my skin turn more orange! My phone turned into an orange, and started screaming sexist and racist things! I am genuinely scared for my life!! I felt like I was being brainwashed into believing that men were superior!! Do NOT download this app!! #dumptrump !!!
attributes.title: Disgusting!!

attributes.review: i will never and i mean NEVER get anything even remotely related to that orange deformed refrigerator box built man. i opened the app and had an immediate stroke and had to be rushed to the ER- the doctor said it was urgent and i would need surgery on my spine. the surgery was $300 but the other $200 was for emotional distress. i will now be emailing the white house for payment information and how i can get my money back.
attributes.title: $500 hospital bill

attributes.review: this app made me feel disgusted. it took hours to download and was very slow. i live in a place with great wifi so this shouldn’t be happening. This app should be taken off the app store and Tiktok should stay. I strongly believe this app is the worst thing that has ever happened to this world. i hope it is taken off the app store and is never to be seen again. he makes me sick.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Like honestly y’all could have done better! Worst app ever like did the people who make it even have enough experience to make this? Like you need to have experience to let other people experience but you didn’t have enough experience to accomplish the experience others wanted so why don’t you go get some experience. ✨🧚‍♀️pendejos🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Worst app to ever be made ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: you haven’t done anything that would help America. calling corona virus a hoax, trying to reopen schools completely. plus you are so racist. build a wall. not supporting the black lives matter movement. ever since you were president, I did not see any good changes. you are also sexist with female reporters, and was also racist to china when corona hit. so, you get one star rating you shriveled up orange.
attributes.title: no

attributes.review: When I entered the app I saw Cheeto nudes, I instantly grabbed my bleach and stated washing my eyes. The bleach wasn’t working so I got a needle and injected bleach in my eyes, because Cheeto told us to during COVID so I thought it might help get the image of him out of my head. That didn’t work so I have decided to get a eye transplant from Doctor Nick. And furthermore this app took 76 weeks to download. + it turned all my apps back to 1975
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️no✨
